document.forum_title: Latest News on newsR - Top Headlines and News Videos
document.discussion_title: Trump Tower Climber Charged With Trespassing, Endangerment
document.topic_text: Trump Tower Climber Charged With Trespassing, Endangerment Thursday, 11 August 2016 ( 12 hours ago ) New York City police charged the man who attempted to scale Trump Tower with reckless endangerment and criminal trespassing. Trump Tower Climber Faces Criminal Charges 00:44 Stephen Rogata, the man who scaled Trump Tower in New York on Wednesday, will be arraigned in criminal court and formally charged with reckless endangerment and criminal trespass. Rogata climbed the building in a failed effort to meet Donald Trump. Rogata will appear in court on Thursday, a day after...
